column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: institution. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/institution#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Institution rdf:type rdfs:Class .:PublicInstitution rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution .:PrivateInstitution rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution .:name rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:location rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:founded rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range xsd:date .:Institution rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf owl:Thing ;    rdfs:comment "A complex structure composed of different people who unite to meet a need or to pursue collective goals".```
